name: Batak Music
description: Music of the Batak people, an Austronesian people native to Sumatra.

children.name: Gondang
children.description: Traditional ensemble in Bataknese traditional music of North Sumatra, taking its name from its leading instrument - a unique set of toned drums.

children.name: Gondang
children.description: Traditional ensemble in Bataknese traditional music of North Sumatra, taking its name from its leading instrument - a unique set of toned drums.

children.name: Pop Batak
children.description: Combines Western genres of music and instrumentation with a typical Batak flair, like lyrics about Batak life and the use of some traditional Batak instruments.
